title: Boost Your Art Sale!
description: Get your artwork featured on our homepage for 24 hours and reach thousands of potential buyers.
reason: Click to learn more about our Social Booster packs.

title: Launch Your Vintage Collection
description: Promote your entire vintage clothing collection with a dedicated email blast to our subscribers.
reason: Target fashion lovers directly in their inbox.

title: Sell Out Your Handmade Goods
description: Feature your craft items in our 'Handmade Heroes' section for a week.
reason: Get prime placement in a popular category.

title: Spotlight Your Tech Gadgets
description: We'll create a professional video short showcasing your tech item and promote it on our social channels.
reason: Engage buyers with dynamic video content.

title: Furniture Feature
description: List your furniture piece in our weekly 'Interior Inspiration' lookbook.
reason: Show your item in a beautifully styled context.

title: Collector's Corner
description: Get your collectibles (coins, stamps, figures) appraised and featured by our expert partners.
reason: Add credibility and attract serious collectors.

title: Auction Alert
description: Send a push notification to all users watching the 'Auction' category right before your auction ends.
reason: Create urgency and drive last-minute bids.

title: Local Love
description: Promote your ad to all users within a 25-mile radius of your location.
reason: Perfect for items that are hard to ship.

title: MAZ-AI Ad Copywriting
description: Let our AI rewrite your title and description to be more engaging and improve its visibility in search.
reason: Optimize your listing with the power of AI.

title: The Trader's Edge
description: Highlight your 'For Trade' items to users who have similar items listed.
reason: Find the perfect trading partner faster.

title: Holiday Gift Guide Placement
description: Feature your item in our official Holiday Gift Guide, seen by millions of shoppers.
reason: Capitalize on seasonal shopping traffic.

title: Flash Sale Promotion
description: Announce a 24-hour flash sale on your items with a banner on the main feed.
reason: Generate quick sales and buzz.

title: Musician's Marketplace
description: Get your instrument or gear featured in our curated section for musicians.
reason: Reach a passionate and knowledgeable audience.

title: Automotive Spotlight
description: Promote your car or motorcycle parts to users who have viewed related vehicles.
reason: Connect with motivated buyers and DIY enthusiasts.

title: Book Club Recommendation
description: Have your rare or first-edition book featured as the 'MAZ Book Club Pick of the Week'.
reason: Attract bibliophiles and serious collectors.

title: Early Access Preview
description: Give a select group of power users early access to your new listings before they go public.
reason: Build hype and secure initial sales.

title: Designer Fashion Feature
description: Your luxury fashion item will be included in our weekly 'Designer Drops' newsletter.
reason: Reach high-intent buyers interested in luxury goods.

title: The Gamer's Advantage
description: Promote your video games or hardware on our dedicated gaming portal.
reason: Connect with a massive community of gamers.

title: Home Decor Highlight
description: Feature your decor item in a 'Shop the Look' post on our official Instagram.
reason: Leverage our social media reach for massive exposure.

title: Eco-Friendly Focus
description: Get your sustainable or upcycled product featured in our 'Green Marketplace' collection.
reason: Appeal to environmentally conscious shoppers.
